TopicTitle: Count to 50 before someone whose name starts/ends with "X"!

Articles.Content:
Alright, the person whose name starts/ends with a specific letter/number of that page resets it! Your target is 50.

But there is a catch: 1-minute cooling-off period will be applied everytime a person posts, to prevent posts in quick succession.

Also, the post orders will be in the following order: A for 1, B for 2, and so on... after 26 posts it will return to A. Same thing with the posts in numerical order: 1 for 1, 2 for 2, 0 for 10, and so on... Every 10 posts it will return to 1.

I'll start:

1
This game is like the one with the moderators, anyone remember?
